name: v1_caloriesburned
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool calories_burned_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Calories burned calculator for hundreds of different sports/activities. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/caloriesburned.
API description: Fetches the number of calories burned for a given activity using the API Ninjas Calories Burned API.

activity.description: The name of the activity. Partial values are allowed (e.g., 'ski' will match both 'water skiing' and 'downhill skiing').

weight.description: weight of the user performing the activity in pounds. Must be between 50 and 500. Default value is 160.

duration.description: how long the activity was performed in minutes. Must be 1 or greater. Default value is 60 (1 hour).
